caption: filter
doc: Use this method to filter the viz before initialization. If used after initialization, it will re-render the viz. For filtering after initialization, use the other filtering methods, such as applyFilterAsync.  If you add the same filter fields using the addFilter() method and by using the <viz-filter> element in the <tableau-viz> web component, you might experience unexpected behavior.

ABI.caption: Use this method to filter the viz before initialization. If used after initialization, it will re-render the viz. For filtering after initialization, use the other filtering methods, such as applyFilterAsync.  If you add the same filter fields using the addFilter() method and by using the <viz-filter> element in the <tableau-viz> web component, you might experience unexpected behavior.
ABI.name: information

ABJ.caption: Field
ABJ.doc: The name of the field to filter on.
ABJ.name: field

ABK.caption: Values
ABK.doc: Single value or a list of comma separated values to filter on.
ABK.name: values
